course_description: An introduction to theoretical mathematics. Logic and proofs, operations on sets, induction, relations, functions.
prerequisites: This course requires MATH 111 as prerequisite AND MATH 112 or MATH_OX112 or MATH 112Z or MATH_OX112Z or equivalent transfer credit.
